name: EFQRCode
summary: A better way to operate quick response code in Swift.
description: EFQRCode is a lightweight, pure-Swift library for generating pretty QRCode image with input watermark or icon and recognizing QRCode from image, it is based on CoreGraphics, CoreImage and ImageIO. EFQRCode provides you a better way to operate QRCode in your app, it works on iOS, macOS, tvOS and watchOS, and it is available through CocoaPods, Carthage and Swift Package Manager.
